segments.text: This whole scene is frankly quite maddening to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so utterly blind to their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is literally standing in a puddle, oblivious to the fact.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find the overflowing sink incredibly annoying; it's such a waste of resources.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets and warp the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry to see such carelessness in a domestic setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! They are putting themselves in grave danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is absolutely going to collapse under the boy's weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just waiting for the loud crash of falling dishes and a crying child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a truly disgusting display of inattention and recklessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene immediately before things get much worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury here is extremely high, and it frustrates me deeply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could shout a warning into the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
